name: SheeBalloon
description:
Hey, this time i decided to make hand drawn graphics.

 Game:
- SheeBallon is a game about sheep and balloons.
- Climb higher, faster, take care of balloons.
- Collect air for balloons.
- Avoid crow and dark clouds.
- And Good Luck.

Controls:
- Arrows

Tools used:
- Language: Haxe
- Engine: Clay (custom)
- Graphics: Pentel Art Brush
- Audio: Ableton Live
- Editor: Sublime Text

This game is made for Ludum Dare 43.
